title: error trying to upload a new branch

content.raw:
Hello,

we would like to add a Pull request for new robot configuration using two cameras. Therefore I created a new branch, changed the corresponding urdf files and commited the changes. When pushing these changes to the repository using 
 
hg push -f 

I get the error "HTTP Error 403: Forbidden". 

Can someone give me a hint to get the upload done?

Kind Regards 
Wolfgang

PS: Sorry if the question shouldn't be raised here. I couldn't find a better area.
content.html:
Hello,

we would like to add a Pull request for new robot configuration using two cameras. Therefore I created a new branch, changed the corresponding urdf files and commited the changes. When pushing these changes to the repository using

hg push -f

I get the error "HTTP Error 403: Forbidden".

Can someone give me a hint to get the upload done?

Kind Regards Wolfgang

PS: Sorry if the question shouldn't be raised here. I couldn't find a better area.
